title: Looking for players to play with.
body: I'm looking for new players to play draft with to learn the jungle and mid lane position and if we get good enough as a duo or Team we will look in to play Ranked but for now looking for players to work with and learn with while having fun. I don't want to play with anyone who will get triggered because i'm learning how to jungle so that means i will mess up alot.

replies.body: bot duo here looking to start playing ranked but would also prefer some non toxic teammates who want to improve but don’t take things too seriously...happy to play with either one of you. add me if you’re up for it!

Also looking to practice with someone who doesn't get tilted easily. Currently playing top (support as well, but only if it's with a friend...scared of getting flamed). If you're my jg, you might have to ping because my map awareness isn't very good. Even then, I'm not good at multitasking so I might miss your ping while trying to CS...
If I see someone's ping, I often do the thumbs up emoji as an acknowledgement that I've seen the ping.

I don't mind if you want to play with someone else, though, and good luck on your journey to Challenger. :P
